scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.mvp: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd client-mvp-04 && npm run start"
scripts.dev: dotenv -e backend/.env -e client/.env concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.cy:open: dotenv -e client/.env -- cross-var cross-env CYPRESS_baseUrl=%CLIENT_URL% cypress open
scripts.cy:run: dotenv -e client/.env -- cross-var cross-env CYPRESS_baseUrl=%CLIENT_URL% cypress run --headed
scripts.test:cy: dotenv -e ./backend/.env -e ./client/.env cross-var start-test dev:api %BACKEND_PORT% dev:client %CLIENT_PORT% cy:run
scripts.test:all: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run test:client && npm run test:client-mvp && npm run test:backend && npm run test:cy
